definitions.definition: having the colour of blue and red mixed together

examples.text: His face was purple with rage.
The effort was making her face turn purple.
It produces lovely dark purple berries around this time of year.

definitions.definition: writing or a piece of writing that is too grand in style

wordOrigin: Old English (describing the clothing of an emperor), alteration of purpre, from Latin purpura ‘purple’, from Greek porphura, denoting molluscs that yielded a crimson dye, also cloth dyed with this.
